section.title: Purpose
section.para: This document describes how to use the CDR Graphing Demo Application.

section.title: Scope
section.para: This document is intended for the software development contractors and their team, in order to comply with general admitted rules from both parties, concerning the use of correct, well formed, up to date, relevant and clear install documents.

section.title: General Principles
section.para: This document make the following assumptions:

listitem.para: The MIPN CDR Graph Demo App has been installed by following the MIPN CDR Graph Demo App Install Guide.
